definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: This may seem like a rampant game actually only designed by xishi appeared.
sentences.chinese: 这看似猖獗的游戏实则只为西施自行现身而设计。

sentences.english: The fangs of surface humble, but the dog, full of greed narrow-minded.
sentences.chinese: 表面谦卑恭敬的大牙狗，实则心胸狭窄，充满贪欲。

sentences.english: To covet and take from others is to harm one's own character.
sentences.chinese: 因贪念而侵夺他人，实则伤害自己的人格。

sentences.english: Actually gives advocate hand of knife doctor instantly, help expose focus of a disease.
sentences.chinese: 实则给主刀医生当下手，帮忙暴露病灶。

sentences.english: Two people love false very much in love, but decided to venture.
sentences.chinese: 两人假意卿卿我我，实则决定冒险行动。

sentences.english: Work properly son, this matter looks like simple, actually then not easy.
sentences.chinese: 灵儿，此事看似简单，实则不易。

sentences.english: The full-length novel "Old Gao village" is in fact a fable.
sentences.chinese: 长篇小说《高老庄》实则是一个寓言。

sentences.english: Apple's recent obsession with gold-colored versions of its products is indeed a response to preferences in China.
sentences.chinese: 苹果公司近来对金色产品的偏好实则是受中国的影响。

sentences.english: Using silver this way might sound expensive, but it is not.
sentences.chinese: 如此使用银乍听起来十分昂贵，实则不然。

sentences.english: It is a seemingly simple tower defense game, but in reality is a highly strategic game.
sentences.chinese: 一个看似简单实则极富策略性的塔防游戏。

sentences.english: They escape tax by the pseudophase of book loss.
sentences.chinese: 很多外企制造账面亏损假相，实则为逃避税收。

definition: in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
to appear to be/to seem as if
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
